1.content: Let's just get this out of the way. What is the gender of your chosen POV character, and are they a charcter from one of your favourite fandoms or an original creation?
1.title: Decisions, Decisions

11.content:
Here are your first picks for a POV character, along with some basic guidelines. If you are wondering about what the whole status thing is about, here it just refers to whether or not the character has magical abilities, has gone through special training of some sort, is a cyborg and all that jazz:


Serena Tsukino:

Age at The Beginning of the Story: 14
Originally From: Sailor Moon
Species/Status: Human/Magical Girl
Photo: http://media.animegalleries.net/albums/media/15/sm_moon891.jpg?=123
Personality Traits:
*Outgoing
*Kindhearted
*Ditzy
*Childish
*A bit of a daydreamer

Kairi (feel free to come up with a last name):

Age at The Beginning of the Story: 15
Originally From: Kingdom Hearts
Species/Status: Human/Keyblade wielder-in-training
Photo: http://www.cosplayisland.co.uk/files/costumes/3752/32574/Kairi-kingdom-hearts-26...
Personality Traits:
*Caring
*Not afraid to speak her mind
*Cheerful
*Loyal
*Headstrong

Raven Roth:

Age at The Beginning of the Story: 16
Originally From: Teen Titans
Species/Status: Half-human and half-demon/part time superhero
Photo: {link:http://3.bp.blogspot.com/_klePga6fTIs/S210mCyLFeI/AAAAAAAAAUQ/ZQ8KmCYEXdA/ s320/Raven+sitting.jpg}
Personality Traits:
*Quiet
*Sarcastic
*Reclusive
*Trys to keep her emotions under control
*Cares deeply about her friends

Hinata Hyuga:

Age at the Beginning of the Story: 15
Originally From: Naruto
Species/Status: Human/Ninja-in-training
Photo: http://a21.idata.over-blog.com/298x317/2/51/14/35/Naruto/hinata02.PNG
Personality Traits:
*Shy
*Gets depressed easily
*Lacks confidence, but is improving in that regard
*Not good with telling anyone she has a crush on how she feels
*Bit of a romantic
11.title: Female (Canon Character)

13.content:
Here are your first picks for a POV character, along with some basic guidelines. If you are wondering about what the whole status thing is about, here it just refers to whether or not the character has magical abilities, has gone through special training of some sort, is a cyborg and all that jazz:

Tabitha "Tabby" Ferris-Coup:

Age at The Beginning of the Story: 15
Species/Status: Human/Has a eidetic memory
Photo: http://wwwdelivery.superstock.com/WI/223/1589/PreviewComp/SuperStock_1589R-74517...
Personality Traits:
*Cheerful
*Laidback
*Comes from a wealthy family
*Was home schooled for most of her life, so she is somewhat oblivious in social situations as a result
*Has a fondess for mystery novels and crime shows

Arielle' (no last name given):

Age at The Beginning of the Story: 500 years. Though she looks to be 17, as that was how old she was when she was turned
Species/Status: Vampire/Has picked up several fighting styles during her travels
Photo: http://us.123rf.com/400wm/400/400/doctorkan/doctorkan0804/doctorkan080400377/289...
Personality Traits:
*Cold towards strangers, but is kind and loyal towards the few people she considers friends and anyone she has romantic feelings for
*Smokes alot
*Understandibly bitter about being an immortal vampire stuck in high school
*Does'nt talk about her life before she was bitten that much
*Secretly writes alot of romantic poetry in her spare time

Rin Satomi:

Age at The Beginning of the Story: Was built a couple of years ago, but looks to be about 17
Species/Status: Robot/Recently installed with an AI
Photo: http://img.youtube.com/vi/ywg-aJlQbmo/0.jpg
Personality Traits:
*Tends to keep to herself
*Deadpan snarker with emphasis on the deadpan aspect
*Is curious about human emotions, and is on a mission to understand them
*Finds the idea of sex disturbing unless it's for the purpose of procreation
*That being said, she is very intriged by the notion of romantic companionship

Kaycee Disgleirio:

Age at The Beginning of the Story: 1400, but looks to be 14
Species/Status: Half-elf/Half-human (her mother was the elf)/Has limited magical abilities
Photo: http://www.scenicreflections.com/ithumbs/Cute_Elf_Wallpaper_nhc5k.jpg
Personality Traits:
*Wide-eyed idealist
*Something of a cloud cuckoo lander http://tvtropes.org/pmwiki/pmwiki.php/Main/CloudCuckooLander
*Is a total love freak, to the point where she often assumes the role of matchmaker and helps people find love
*Though her help sometimes steers itself into "stop helping me" territory
*Tries to be a friend to all living things, though most animals hate her
13.title: Female (Original Character)

131.content:
Not that long ago in another land far far away, there exists a city named Dreamer's Gate. To call this city "quite large" was rather like saying the Himalayas are "a little tall" or that the North Pole was "a bit chilly". For it was a sprawling metropolis, notable for precisely three things.


1; The surroundings ranged from the tallest skyscrapers to the flattest plains, the hottest deserts to the cold tundras and the dullest, most non-descript buildings for which "absolutely average" was the sole fitting description to frankly bizarre structures that seemed to have not followed any sort of plan whatsoever when they were constructed (in fact these buildings were often shifting and changing in how they were arranged and sometimes where they were situated, to the point where the people who made the maps pretty much had the worst jobs in the city). It was as if whatever great being who created this place had just decided to throw everything they had available together with little to no planning or foresight at all.


2; The population of the area was exceptionally diverse. Living alongside ordinary humans were several species of aliens, fairies, elves, dwarves, Hobbits, robots, vampires werewolves, ghosts, humans with magical powers, humans with superpowers, dragons, anthropomorphic animals, along with an assortment of beings far too weird to even begin to describe. While racial tensions were not non-existent, for the most part they were on amiable terms, forming friendships, rivalries, partnerships, romantic relationships and sometimes having children with one another.


And 3; At the centre of the city was the high school known as Crossover High, which along with Ouran Academy (which was the sort of school were, apart from the odd student who did exceptionally well in their schoolwork, only the children of millionaires and billionaires could get in) and Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry (where the majority of those within the city who where young and had magical abilities learned their craft) was one of the most prominent educational establishments in Dreamer's Gate. This school was noticeable A) because of the incredibly diverse range of subjects and courses it covered and B) because the school courtyard had a fountain with figures of a mermaid, a golem, a phoenix and an angel standing next to each other in the middle of it, each one clutching a sphere in their respective appendages. It was nothing short of eye-catching, and generally one of those things that no one ever forgets. And from one morning onward until the end of their life, the protagonist of our tale will certainly never forget.


Tabitha looked around the courtyard, dressed in her uniform (which consisted of a white dress shirt, a dark grey vest with the symbols of earth, wind, water and fire on the left breast, a light grey and blue tie, a dark grey knee-length skirt, white stockings and black dress shoes) with her shoulder-length brown hair kept out of her eyes with two yellow hairclips. She made her way towards the main building, her brown eyes gazing intently at every aspect of the school. From the iconic fountain to the bizarre architecture, everything was facineting to the young girl who up until today had spent her life at home. She couldn't help but smile and be in awe about how different things were going to be from here on out.

Just then.....
131.title: Tabby

1312.content: As soon as she was close to the front door, Tabby bumped into someone and sent the both of them tumbling to the ground. While she picked herself up, dusted off her uniform and apologized, she noticed that the person she bumped into was.....
1312.title: An Eventful Encounter

135.content:
The first set wasn't your cup of tea? What about these two?:

Robin Slack

Age at The Beginning of the Story: 15
Species/Status: Human/Has some combat training
Appearence: Short, curly red hair, green eyes with flecks of grey and pale skin with plenty of freckles. Is of above average height and has a muscular build for a girl of her age. Typically wears clothing that promently features butterflies.
Personality Traits:
*Tomboy
*Genius Bruiser, especially on the subject of animals and butterflies
*Genius Ditz
*Loves the outdoors
*Is a bit flirtatious

Gweneth Slack

Age at The Beginning of the Story: 15
Species/Status: Human/Has some magical abilities
Appearence: Medium length pale blonde hair, green eyes with flecks of grey and pale skin. Is of above average height, a bit chubby and wears glasses.
Personality Traits:
*Bookworm
*Loves gardening and sewing
*Loves to write stories in her spare time
*Shy around the opposite sex
*Deadpan snarker
135.title: More

*Has a soft spot for animals
14.title: Male (Original Character)

info.brief_description: Where characters old and new have to deal with high school.  Short version:welcome to hell
info.description:
Hi. So this is just something I came up with, partly out of sheer boredom but mainly because I wanted to have a go at doing a high school AU. For a POV character you can chose either one of your favourite characters from one of your favourite fandoms or create your own character of either gender. Feel free to use your imagination, but please remember these rules:

1: While a lot of high school AUs tend to make their setting just like the real world, I think it might be interesting to explore what it would be like if some of the more fantastic elements were kept. So magic, aliens, robots, time travel, vampires, fairies, superpowers, all that sci-fi/fantasy/horror/whatever jazz, is encouraged.

2: I don't really care whether or not you play this straight, parody it, deconstruct certain elements or whatever. But if you intend to start off light hearted and then take it into darker and edgier territory, try to build up to it rather than just have it be abrupt.

3: If you must swear, then use descretion. A few swear words here and there are ok, but this work will not be improved by having all the characters going off like sailors.

and 4: Regardless of your choice for a POV character, remember not to make your character a Mary Sue. A good character needs flaws as well as strengths for the story to work. No one is going to bother with your entries if they are just an excuse for a blatant ego trip.

That's all I have to say about that. Not much else to say apart from just add what you want to add and enjoy.
